function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Differing articulation of scales of government impacting smart city architecture","Impact":"Inconsistent public health crisis management and response","Mitigation":"Establish standardized communication and coordination protocols among different levels of government","Technologies":"Smart communication and data integration technologies","People":"Public health officials, government administrators","Owner":"Government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of unified smart city policy in South Africa","Impact":"Inconsistent implementation of public health policy in major cities","Mitigation":"Develop a unified smart city policy framework for public health crisis management","Technologies":"Smart policy integration platforms, data analytics tools","People":"Government officials, city administrators","Owner":"National and municipal government"},{"Description":"Decentralization on paper in the context of the Smart City Mission in India","Impact":"Ineffective decentralization of public health crisis management","Mitigation":"Implement decentralized decision-making structures and empower local administrative offices","Technologies":"Decentralized data management systems, digital governance platforms","People":"Local government officials, public health authorities","Owner":"Central government"}]}
